SageTVPlugin.Name: DVB Decrypter
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin allows you to record and watch encrypted channels from all your native DVB-S/T/C tuners.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.0 - First Public Release. 1.0.1 - Fix WinX64 key path. Better "no tuner" situation handling. 1.0.2 - More instrumented debug. 1.0.3 - Changed autotune algorithm due to lazy tuners. 1.0.4 - Support hybrid tuners. Fixes sometime test channel is encrypted, look for first clear channel instead. 1.0.5 - Startup procedure no longer required. Fixes failure in service mode. 1.0.6 - Removed unused types and methods. Disabled the SageTV PTSFix. 1.0.7 - Support BSkyB channels. 1.0.8 - Support physical channels made of the form [NID-TID-SID-CH] for transport stream EPG detection. 1.0.9 - Handle channel tuning synchronisation failure. 1.1.0 - Enabled the SageTV PTSFix setting in the registry. 1.1.1 - Fix channel matching algorithm. 1.1.2 - New channel selection algorithm. New registration procedure with external batch file. 1.1.3 - Never released. 1.1.4 - Add commercials skipper capabilities enabled by categories and favourites matching (not supported by the filter yet). 1.1.5 - Updated dependencies with DVB Decrypter Filter plugin. 1.1.6 - Updated dependencies with DVB Decrypter Filter and Card Server plugins. 1.1.7 - Fix sometimes the SID is not sent to filter. 1.1.8 - Supports tuner full reload mechanism from STV.
